name: Tainted Halls
description:
Warning: This game may contain disturbing imagery, flashing lights and loud noises.

Plot: You have no memory of anything beyond your name. You are a young girl, lost in a cold basement that welcomes you with stained blood and engulfing darkness. You must get out of there, no matter what.

A keyboard and mouse is required to play the game. A controller can be used as well if mapped with a program such as JoyToKey.

Note: The game is in beta, there may be bugs, errors, and anything may be subject to change. All feedback is appreciated.
